extDesc.message: New 'New Tab' Page. Weather, News, Search, recently closed tabs and apps in one place.

translate.description: Google Translate in the apps list (first four)

maps.description: Google Maps in the apps list (first four)

removedWebsite.description: Appears when the 'X' on a thumbnail had been clicked

search.description: The placeholder text in the search box

remove.description: The title for the 'X' on the most visited thumbnails (shown on hover)

undo.description: Located in the message after a 'X' had been clicked

restoreAll.description: Located in the message after a 'X' had been clicked

recentlyClosed.description: The title for the recently closed box

google.description: Google URL, just costumize the domain ending for you language

serviceURL.description: Google Service URL, just costumize the domain ending for you language

searchURL.description: Google Search URL, just costumize the domain ending for you language

weather.description: The title for the weather box (hidden)

apps.description: The title for the apps box (hidden)

news.description: The title for the news box (hidden)

moreNews.description: Located at the bottom of the news box

promotedServices.message: The first four Apps are promoted from Google (More on chrome://apps)

locationBased.description: In the info box of the weather box

coolWeather.description: In the info box of the weather box

on.description: Used in the slider in info boxes

off.description: Used in the slider in info boxes

temperatureUnit.description: The temperature unit for this language (only insert C for Celsius or F for Fahrenheit)

chromeWebStore.description: Title for the Chrome Web Store in the apps list (first spot)
